name: ACTION SIX! (vol.I)
description:
Action Six! is a series of 6-game compilations, featuring a combination of games we've developed in the past, and games we're working on right now. These games are constructed around arcade-style, or endless play.

Games included in Action Six! are also fairly prototype-- concepts that we wanted to test out before going into development with them.

The "completion" state of some of these games is questionable, but they're all typically built around repeating play.

Some Action Six! titles are in continued development-- occasionally, we may release AX6 updates to various volumes to update the games included to better versions.

With your purchase, you help us keep bills paid and get better hardware / software while we continue work on larger projects. Please consider picking up our games-- your support is greatly appreciated!

VOLUME I

  1. GLASS CANNONS Arcade Prototype updated SEP 17!
  2. CHROMAZONE
  3. FEVERMAN Prototype
  4. Navigator
  5. BAD NEWS BOMBS
  6. solaris

You can get these titles with the base games if you purchase the DELUXE version for $12!

  • VIRALWIPEOUT: VR Defender
  • Gearbeasts: Endless Blitz Prototype
  • Puppet Kingdom Prototype
  • Me VS You (2P Only)

Look out for volume II coming out sometime next month!
